sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)

match_context.values: @{RuleName=T1060,RunKey; Details=C:\Program Files (x86)\PCI Monitor\pcimon.exe; EventID=13; Image=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\file.exe; EventType=SetValue; TargetObject=HKLM\SOFTWARE\WOW6432Node\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run\PCI Monitor}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: ADS Zone.Identifier Deleted By Uncommon Application
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the deletion of the "Zone.Identifier" ADS by an uncommon process. Attackers can leverage this in order to bypass security restrictions that make use of the ADS such as Microsoft Office apps.
Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)

attributes.magic: PE32 executable (GUI) Intel 80386 Mono/.Net assembly, for MS Windows

exiftool.ImageFileCharacteristics: Executable, No line numbers, No symbols, 32-bit

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO DYNAMIC_DNS Query to *.duckdns. Domain
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO DYNAMIC_DNS Query to *.duckdns. Domain"; dns.query; content:".duckdns."; nocase; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2022918; rev:4; metadata:created_at 2016_06_27, confidence Medium, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2022_11_30, reviewed_at 2024_04_16;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO DYNAMIC_DNS Query to a *.duckdns .org Domain
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO DYNAMIC_DNS Query to a *.duckdns .org Domain"; dns.query; content:".duckdns.org"; fast_pattern; nocase; endswith; reference:url,changeip.com; classtype:bad-unknown; sid:2042936; rev:2; metadata:attack_target Client_and_Server, created_at 2022_12_15, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2023_03_02, mitre_tactic_id TA0011, mitre_tactic_name Command_And_Control, mitre_technique_id T1568, mitre_technique_name Dynamic_Resolution;)

configs: @{implant_info=; files_dropped=System.Object[]; extra_info=; host_info=; net_info=; tool=MANDIANT_BACKSCATTER; txt_configs=System.Object[]}
